Vuyelwa Booi (amụrụ na 6 Eprel 1981), bụ onye South Afrika na-eme ihe nkiri, onye n’eti egwu na onye na-egosi televishọn. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Chappie, Swartwater ya na Sink
A mụrụ Booi na 6 Eprel 1981 na Soweto, Johannesburg, South Africa
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Dominican Convent na Belgravia, Johannesburg
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Potchefstroom High School maka umunwaanyi ma gụọ akwụkwọ na 1998
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ịbụ abụ na ukwe ma mee ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
O mechara nzere na Theatre Arts na Midrand University, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Midrand Graduate Institute
N'afọ 2015, o kwupụtara na ọ dara mbà n'obi ruo ọtụtụ afọ.
N'afọ 1997, a họpụtara ya na North West Youth Choir ma mee njem na Europe na July
N'oge njem a, o nwere ike ime ihe nkiri na mba ise, sonye na asọmpi yana ememme ukwe
N'afọ 2000, o nwetara ohere ịrụ ọrụ ndu na egwuregwu ụlọ ọrụ na Ahia Theatre

N'afọ 2001, ọ sonyeere ndị otu SABC2 soap opera 7de Laan Na soapie, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka "Alyce Morapedi" ruo n'afọ 2004. N'afọ 2005, ọ kwagara New York ma mụtakwuo ihe nkiri mgbe ọ debanyere aha na New York Film Academy
Otú ọ dị, ọ pụghị imecha usoro ahụ.
Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa na Disemba 2005, Vuyelwa sonyeere egwu egwu Drumstruck rụrụ na Broadway
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2006, o mere nkwado olu maka onye egwu Wyclef Jean maka remix nke 2006 FIFA World Cup theme song tinyere Shakira
Mgbe afọ abụọ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere ọzọ na soapie 7de Laan na Nọvemba 2006. Ka ọ na aga, ọ nwetara ọrụ ndu nke "Pabi" nke ihe nkiri ndị ntorobịa SABC1 Soul Buddyz oge atọ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara dịka onye ọbịa na ihe ngosi egwuregwu egwu SABC2 Noot vir Noot
N'oge ahụ, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ na-akwado usoro magazin ndụ SABC2 Pasella
N'afọ 2010, ọ nọchiri Dosto Noge dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi ikike ndị ahịa SABC2 "Speak Out" maka oge nke anọ ya
N'afọ 2015, ọ nọchiri Anele Mdoda dị ka onye na-elekọta usoro ihe nkiri Dream School SA N'otu afọ ahụ, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ na Hollywood blockbuster Chappie ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ "Maria" na ihe nkiri Sink
N'afọ 2017, ọ sonyeere ndị otu Swartwater ma rụọ ọrụ "Portia Malefe".
